name.en: Practical project on social return on investment
name.ch: 社會投資報酬分析實務專題

remark.ch: 限影響力創業家實驗室學生選修

goal.en: This course aims to introduce the framework of Social Return on Investment (SROI) with practical projects. Students can learn how to implement such framework to measure and manage the impacts of organizations. This is the essential skill needed for ESG or sustainability management.
goal.ch: 介紹Social Return on Investment (SROI)架構與方法，指導學生深入相關社會企業或組織進行社會投資報酬分析(SROI)的實務專題，提升其社會實踐之資源管理能力。
